name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2016
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2016年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: The primary aluminum ingot casting process described in this dataset is used to produce raw aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum. This process is essential for the creation of high-purity aluminum products that are used in various applications including automotive, aerospace, construction, and electronics industries. The ingots formed from this process can be further processed to manufacture aluminum components and parts.
本数据集描述的原生铝锭铸造工艺用于从液态原铝生产原生铝锭。该工艺对于创造应用于汽车、航空航天、建筑和电子行业的高纯度铝制品至关重要。通过此过程形成的铝锭可以进一步加工制造铝制组件和部件。

technology.technologicalApplicability: The primary aluminum ingot casting process described in this dataset is used to produce raw aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum. This process is essential for the creation of high-purity aluminum products that are used in various applications including automotive, aerospace, construction, and electronics industries. The ingots formed from this process can be further processed to manufacture aluminum components and parts.
本数据集描述的原生铝锭铸造工艺用于从液态原铝生产原生铝锭。该工艺对于创造应用于汽车、航空航天、建筑和电子行业的高纯度铝制品至关重要。通过此过程形成的铝锭可以进一步加工制造铝制组件和部件。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.
本研究的数据参考了PA、SA、电力等背景数据的LCA数据。PA数据来自统计数据源，SA数据主要来自文献。背景数据主要来自中国科学院生态环境研究中心CASRCEES 2018建立的中国本地化LCA数据库，涵盖能源、材料、交通、废物管理等LCA数据。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: Users of this data set should take into account the specific year of the data (2016) and the scope of the life cycle assessment. The data for primary aluminum (PA), secondary aluminum (SA), electricity, and other background information draw from statistical data sources and literatures, with additional background data from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018. It is crucial to ensure methodological consistency when applying this data to LCA studies. Considerations should include the geographic relevance of the data, potential changes in production technology since 2016, and alignment with the goal and scope of the LCA being conducted. Users might need to account for potential variations in the quality of aluminum, as well as adapt the dataset for specific purposes by including or excluding certain life cycle stages or processes based on relevant methodological choices.

使用这份数据集的用户应考虑数据的特定年份（2016年）和生命周期评估的范围。原生铝（PA）、再生铝（SA）、电力和其他背景信息的数据来源于统计数据和文献，其他背景数据则来自中国本地化生命周期评估数据库CAS RCEES 2018年。应用这些数据到LCA研究时，确保方法论的一致性是至关重要的。需要考量的因素包括数据的地理相关性、自2016年以来生产技术的潜在改变，以及与正在进行的LCA的目标和范围的对齐。用户可能需要考虑铝的质量变化，以及根据相关的方法学选择，通过包括或排除某些生命周期阶段或过程来为特定目的调整数据集。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
